original_title: The Mavericks Show Volume 4 - Live from Nashville
overview: Captured in February 2021 at their Nashville studios, the Mavericks perform a vibrant set of country, Tex-Mex, soul, rock ’n’ roll and Latin music that includes songs from “En Español,” ‘Play the Hits,” and more. The film also features interviews with the Fantastic Five sidemen.
title: The Mavericks Show Volume 4 - Live from Nashville
